Text:
Wow.... All that info up above, and NO FRAMERATE. Is it NTSC? PAL? 30fps (cam)?? 

And NO SAMPLE either.  WTF?

Soura, you should dispense with the trivia, e.g. useless crap like color space, chroma sampling, matrix coefficients, etc. and include the aforementioned essentials instead.

Great release, thanks!
Btw., @Michaelwatson if you don't like it, just find something else and stop bothering people with your inappropriate remarks!
